content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generation Setup at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Solar Panels (0 units craftable)
- Steam Engines (0 units craftable)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory for required resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target area.
